name: Lambda
description:
Student project for Universidad Técnica Federico Santa María's Taller de Creación de Videojuegos class, by three French exchange students, Aurélien Chatelain, Paul Mollet-Padier, and Clément Sourice.

The game was inspired by the 1979 classic Asteroids, but with a couple little extras such as player movement and powerups!

Keys:

  • Movement: Up/Down Arrow (only when you have fuel)
  • Fire: Spacebar
  • Bomb: Shift
  • Pause: Escape
